Test Name: Early Onset Monogenic Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD) Gene Panel
Purpose: To identify pathogenic or likely pathogenic variants in genes associated with early onset monogenic IBD for diagnostic and treatment guidance.
Container: EDTA tube (for whole blood) or TE buffer tube/vial (for extracted DNA)
Equipment: Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) platform, DNA extraction kit, spectrophotometer (e.g., NanoDrop), fluorometer (e.g., Qubit), bioinformatics analysis software
